collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (20 total Queries, 20 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT * FROM `tbl_position` WHERE `posID` = '1'
SELECT * FROM `tbl_client_dfiles_c2` WHERE `c2tID` = '24' AND `clientID` = '2'
SELECT * FROM `tbl_c2` WHERE `c2tID` = '24'

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_dfiles_c2` (`firmID`, `clientID`, `c2tID`, `code`, `type`, `question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `desc`, `controleffect`, `assessed`, `yesno`, `comment`, `corptax`, `statutory`, `accountancy`, `other`, `totalcu`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '24', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '<p>Update the permanent file to include new or varied bank mandates, bank accounts and signatories. </p>', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-07-11 15:09:42')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_dfiles_c2` (`firmID`, `clientID`, `c2tID`, `code`, `type`, `question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `desc`, `controleffect`, `assessed`, `yesno`, `comment`, `corptax`, `statutory`, `accountancy`, `other`, `totalcu`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '24', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '<p>Obtain a schedule of all bank and cash balances. <b>(P)</b></p>', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-07-11 15:09:42')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_dfiles_c2` (`firmID`, `clientID`, `c2tID`, `code`, `type`, `question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `desc`, `controleffect`, `assessed`, `yesno`, `comment`, `corptax`, `statutory`, `accountancy`, `other`, `totalcu`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '24', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '<p>Agree totals shown on the lead schedule to the trial balance. <b>(E)</b></p>', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-07-11 15:09:42')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_dfiles_c2` (`firmID`, `clientID`, `c2tID`, `code`, `type`, `question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `desc`, `controleffect`, `assessed`, `yesno`, `comment`, `corptax`, `statutory`, `accountancy`, `other`, `totalcu`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '24', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '<p>Agree comparative figures to the previous period’s statutory financial statements. <b>(D, V)</b></p>', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-07-11 15:09:42')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_dfiles_c2` (`firmID`, `clientID`, `c2tID`, `code`, `type`, `question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `desc`, `controleffect`, `assessed`, `yesno`, `comment`, `corptax`, `statutory`, `accountancy`, `other`, `totalcu`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '24', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '<p>Review cash and bank balances for reasonableness and consistency. <b>(C & E)</b></p>', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-07-11 15:09:42')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_dfiles_c2` (`firmID`, `clientID`, `c2tID`, `code`, `type`, `question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `desc`, `controleffect`, `assessed`, `yesno`, `comment`, `corptax`, `statutory`, `accountancy`, `other`, `totalcu`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '24', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '<p>Revisit the risk assessment, materiality calculation and assignment plan and update as appropriate where matters have been identified during the assignment.</p>', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-07-11 15:09:42')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_dfiles_c2` (`firmID`, `clientID`, `c2tID`, `code`, `type`, `question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `desc`, `controleffect`, `assessed`, `yesno`, `comment`, `corptax`, `statutory`, `accountancy`, `other`, `totalcu`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '24', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '<p>Ensure key findings from this section are included in the draft letter of representation, points for the management letter and points for A.E.P.’s attention.</p>', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-07-11 15:09:42')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_dfiles_c2` (`firmID`, `clientID`, `c2tID`, `code`, `type`, `question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `desc`, `controleffect`, `assessed`, `yesno`, `comment`, `corptax`, `statutory`, `accountancy`, `other`, `totalcu`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '24', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '<p>Ensure that the conclusion is appropriate. <b>(P)</b></p>', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-07-11 15:09:42')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_dfiles_c2` (`firmID`, `clientID`, `c2tID`, `code`, `type`, `question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `desc`, `controleffect`, `assessed`, `yesno`, `comment`, `corptax`, `statutory`, `accountancy`, `other`, `totalcu`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '24', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '<p>Ensure that outstanding cheques and lodgements shown on bank reconciliations have cleared shortly after the period-end. <b>(V, E)</b></p>', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-07-11 15:09:42')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_dfiles_c2` (`firmID`, `clientID`, `c2tID`, `code`, `type`, `question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `desc`, `controleffect`, `assessed`, `yesno`, `comment`, `corptax`, `statutory`, `accountancy`, `other`, `totalcu`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '24', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '<p>Where bank accounts have both credit and debit balances relating to the same financial institution, consider and justify whether these figures should be ‘netted off’ or shown gross. <b>(V)</b></p>', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-07-11 15:09:42')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_dfiles_c2` (`firmID`, `clientID`, `c2tID`, `code`, `type`, `question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `desc`, `controleffect`, `assessed`, `yesno`, `comment`, `corptax`, `statutory`, `accountancy`, `other`, `totalcu`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '24', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '<p>Obtain a bank letter from each bank with which the client has had a relationship during the period. Agree the account balances and ensure all other matters arising are dealt with. <b>(P, R & O, E, C, V)</b></p>\r\n', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-07-11 15:09:42')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_dfiles_c2` (`firmID`, `clientID`, `c2tID`, `code`, `type`, `question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `desc`, `controleffect`, `assessed`, `yesno`, `comment`, `corptax`, `statutory`, `accountancy`, `other`, `totalcu`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '24', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '<p>Review the cash book and the bank statements around the period-end to ensure that any transfers etc. have been properly reflected in the financial statements. <b>(C)</b></p>', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-07-11 15:09:42')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_dfiles_c2` (`firmID`, `clientID`, `c2tID`, `code`, `type`, `question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `desc`, `controleffect`, `assessed`, `yesno`, `comment`, `corptax`, `statutory`, `accountancy`, `other`, `totalcu`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '24', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '<p>Review the cash book and bank statements for the period for any unusual receipts or payments. <b>(E, V)</b></p>', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-07-11 15:09:42')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_dfiles_c2` (`firmID`, `clientID`, `c2tID`, `code`, `type`, `question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `desc`, `controleffect`, `assessed`, `yesno`, `comment`, `corptax`, `statutory`, `accountancy`, `other`, `totalcu`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '24', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '<p>Ensure that any foreign currency balances at the period end have been correctly translated at the period end rate, and ensure there is an adequate accounting policy note. <b>(V, P)</b></p>', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-07-11 15:09:42')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_dfiles_c2` (`firmID`, `clientID`, `c2tID`, `code`, `type`, `question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `desc`, `controleffect`, `assessed`, `yesno`, `comment`, `corptax`, `statutory`, `accountancy`, `other`, `totalcu`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '24', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '<p>Count petty cash balances and agree to the control account. <b>(V, C)</b></p>', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-07-11 15:09:42')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_dfiles_c2` (`firmID`, `clientID`, `c2tID`, `code`, `type`, `question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `desc`, `controleffect`, `assessed`, `yesno`, `comment`, `corptax`, `statutory`, `accountancy`, `other`, `totalcu`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '24', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '<p>Obtain written confirmation of material petty cash floats held. <b>(V)</b></p>', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-07-11 15:09:42')

INSERT INTO `tbl_client_dfiles_c2` (`firmID`, `clientID`, `c2tID`, `code`, `type`, `question`, `extent`, `reference`, `initials`, `desc`, `controleffect`, `assessed`, `yesno`, `comment`, `corptax`, `statutory`, `accountancy`, `other`, `totalcu`, `status`, `remarks`, `added_on`) VALUES ('1', '2', '24', '2.6 H2', '2.6 H2', '<p>List and perform any additional tests considered necessary.</p>', '', '', '', NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, 'Active', NULL, '2024-07-11 15:09:42')
